channel.title: Help adding hill giants
channel.description:
I go this error when i added my hill giants and so confuse on how to fix it here is the error
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ FunScape is online on port 43594-To change this message go into server.java and search for 'FunScape is online' and change is..-MrFun Exceptrion in thread "main" java.land.NumberFormatException: For input string: "112 2536" at java.langNumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(unkown Source) at java.land.Interger.parseInt(unknown Source) atNPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1975) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:556) at server.main(server.java:110) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ please help I have no clue what I did wrong

item.title: Help adding hill giants
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Right-click on the console and select “Mark” from the drop-down menu. Highlight everything you want to copy. Then on the top window pane right-click and select: “Edit -> Copy”

As for the darkbow, if you’re sure it’s in the #317 then your cache is corrupted. If it’s not from #317 then you’ll have to update your cache to load a higher revisions models. (The fact that it says darkbow in your attack tab leads me to believe your cache is corrupted.)

Read full topic

item.title: Help adding hill giants
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

NumberFormatException: For input string: “112 2536”

Use tabs, not spaces.

Also, I applaud you for taking the time to type out that error message, although you do know you can copy from a console, right?

Read full topic
